trigger.expression: {str(The last AutoSupport message was sent successfully.)}=0
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} issue during Autosupport message

trigger_prototype.name: LIF[{#VIF}] on {HOST.NAME} not at home port
SnapMirror [{#SNAPINDEX}] Lag is greater than 1 day
SnapMirror [{#SNAPINDEX}] Lag is greater than 2 days
SnapMirror [{#SNAPINDEX}] Lag is greater than 5 days
Free Size on Volume[{#VOLNAME}] less than 10%
Free Size on Volume[{#VOLNAME}] less than 20%
Free Inode on Volume[{#VOLNAME}] less than 10%
Free Inode on Volume[{#VOLNAME}] less than 25%

item_prototype.name: Volume[{#VOLNAME}] NV Failed State
item_prototype.description: Indicates whether the volume is in nvfailed state. This is only applicable to cluster-mode volumes.

item_prototype.name: Volume[{#VOLNAME}] NV Failed enabled
item_prototype.description: Indicates whether nvfail option is enabled on this volume.

item_prototype.name: Volume[{#VOLNAME}] Type
item_prototype.description: Type of this volume, older volumes are traditional while newer volumes contained in aggregates are flexible.
